short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get flight details with help of images

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience the magic of visual travel search.
instafly.me extension turns the web into your personal travel agent, once installed we show a little button at the corner of any image that you hover over. Click that button and not only we will return the name and location of the place that is seen in the image* but we also return flight and hotel prices to choose from.


* Limitation apply
